<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Brain Drain](/Spells.aspx?ID=2084)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=647" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 260 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Mystery**
[Lore](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=18)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
Will

</row>

</column>

---

You probe the target's mind to glean knowledge. This deals 1d8 mental damage with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save. If the target fails the save, you sort through the stolen memories to attempt a single check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367). Choose a skill that has the Recall Knowledge action, and use the target's skill modifier for the check.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The mental damage increases by 1d8.
name: Brain Drain
